Text: Senator Bayhs OfficeDear Mr Lay On behalf of Senator Bayh thank you for the kind invitation to attend the US Energy Policy at a Crossroads Alternative Futures for the Current Energy Crisis on October The Senator appreciates your thinking of him but unfortunately he has a prior commitment which will prevent him from attending the forum Please accept his sincere regrets Again thank you for your thoughtful invitation I wish you the best of success with your event Sincerely Corinne Tapia Deputy Scheduler
